name: Knight or Flight
description:
In this game, you take the role of a knight to build various structures while defending them from incoming enemies. Fly around with a jetpack to gather and place building materials, or pick up your trusty sword and slay your enemies.

I made this game in four days for the Jame Gam #14.

This is my first ever game jam and it was a lot of fun. I like the concept for the game and plan to build upon it in the future!
